column5: A question about the new Curados, When are they gonna start selling them in Canada?

I think I heard October from Jos at Angling Outfitters in Woodstock. He doesn't have a lot of faith in the newer Shimano lines and prefers the old Curado B (green) to the current Curado D (silver). I don't think he is anticipating anything better for the new Curado E. I tend to disagree with him regarding the B vs. D, I really like the D series but I did see his point with the new Stradic being a downgrade over the old one.  -Brian
The new "E" has plastic side-caps!  NO thanx!   http://www.tacklewarehouse.com/descpageRLCSHIMANO-SCER.html

anticipation can only drive the price up more.  I'm a big fan of original Curados but for the $ now there's a ton of reels just as good if not better  If I had a dollar for every time I recommend the BPS Extreme I'd be a rich man. I have 5 of them now and paid $69 CDN every time they went on sale. I'm not fishing tournaments any more so the abuse level is down but they have perfromed very well for me.
I see it's not available in the 1 series yet so i guess i am going to have to wait a little longer.
September or October here I think. Awesome reels
